name: listen-later-playlist-poller
description: Updates streams array in user entity in DynamoDB
author: Daniel Beckwith

scripts.build: rm listen-later-playlist-poller.zip && zip -rq listen-later-playlist-poller.zip index.js lib/*
scripts.deploy: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name listen-later-playlist-poller --s3-bucket listen-later-lambda-source --s3-key listen-later-playlist-poller
scripts.build-release-deploy: yarn run build && yarn run release && yarn run deploy
